title: Japanese aircraft carriers begin launch
description: Six Japanese aircraft carriers start to launch 183 planes - a mix of fighters, bombers, and torpedo planes.

title: Opana Radar Site detects incoming planes
description: Two U.S. Army privates manning the Opana Radar Site detect incoming planes. Their warning is dismissed as a flight of B-17s due from the mainland.

title: First wave of attack begins
description: The first wave of Japanese planes begins the attack on Pearl Harbor, aiming primarily at the airfields and battleships.

title: USS Arizona is hit
description: A 1,760-pound bomb hits the USS Arizona, causing a massive explosion that sinks the ship within nine minutes.

title: Second wave of attack begins
description: The second wave of Japanese planes begins their attack, targeting other ships and shipyard facilities.

title: Attack ends
description: The attack on Pearl Harbor ends. The Japanese have sunk or heavily damaged eight battleships, three cruisers, four destroyers, and nearly 200 aircraft.

title: US declares war on Japan
description: President Franklin D. Roosevelt delivers his 'Infamy Speech' to Congress, asking for a declaration of war against Japan.
